Title: Disable Zoom-to on Feature Select
Expected Changes: When selecting a point or polygon, the map should no longer automatically zoom to it
General Notes: Mentioned multiple times by Canfor field users as a disruption

Title: Create Downloads Page
Expected Changes: Static page or dynamic table listing supported formats
Feature Request Response: Agreed this is a good interim solution. Long-term, integration with external report generator is preferred.
General Notes: Mentioned in discussion about increasing report usability

Title: Show Label on Select
Expected Changes: Symbols selected should show identifying label
Feature Request Response: Confirmed as an active usability request; UI team to scope.
General Notes: Expected to reduce time spent identifying tracts in field

Title: Download Format Clarity
Expected Changes: Add tooltip or UI text to clarify e.g., SHP, GeoPackage
Feature Request Response: Already flagged in previous discussion—folding into this release.
General Notes: Prompted by confusion from field testers during training

Title: Grouping for TOC Layers
Expected Changes: Allow collapsible/expandable groups (e.g., “Navigation Layers”)
Feature Request Response: Worth exploring with upcoming layer tree redesign
General Notes: Ties into longer term plan to streamline layer management

Title: Tract Filtering by ID
Expected Changes: Add text filter for ID fields
General Notes: Could be tied into broader “smart search” capabilities

Title: Rename 'Sales Navigation Options' to 'Tract Navigation Options'
Expected Changes: UI label should reflect "Tract Navigation Options" in picker and TOC
Feature Request Response: Completed by dev team in April 7 release

Title: Create Downloads Page & Improve Format Clarity
Expected Changes: Show all export formats and add tooltips per format
Feature Request Response: Interim fix agreed on; full integration to follow
General Notes: Prompted by user confusion during training sessions

Title: Add query definitions to navigation layers
Expected Changes: Apply query definitions based on Navigation Options fields.

Title: Simplify CSP Tract Points symbology
Expected Changes: Use single symbol type, distinguish by company vs supplier.

Title: Enable multi-select for Location and Forester picklists
Expected Changes: Allow users to select multiple values.

Title: Toggle layer visibility by symbol in TOC
Expected Changes: Enable toggling by unique symbol group in Table of Contents.

Title: Create geometry from Report-All in Edit
Expected Changes: Add support for geometry creation from report-all query.

Title: Enable shape upload in Edit menu
Expected Changes: Allow shape file uploads directly via Edit panel.

Title: Change zoom level on point select
Expected Changes: Modify zoom level to be closer when selecting a point.

Title: Add scale limits to CSP Points
Expected Changes: Add scale limits to control CSP Points visibility.

Title: Fix title block text in Print layout
Expected Changes: Correct field mapping for title block text on print.

Title: Remove report button from header
Expected Changes: Remove report button from header bar.

Title: Fix missing profile on startup
Expected Changes: Ensure default profile loads at launch.

Title: Update Tract Picker Label
Expected Changes: UI label on picker should read “Tract Navigation Options”
Feature Request Response: This change was confirmed and completed by dev team.
General Notes: Requested by Forestry team to reflect correct nomenclature
